metadata.synopsis: The different states for a Gondian in the foundry. In this dialogue Frell can be - terrified and working on a watcher under the watchful gaze of an overseers, post fight with said overseers, post the iron throne exploding (doesn't know if his wife is safe or not), and alone now that toobin (his leader) has been killed and he's freaking out about how to remove his collar/leave the foundry.

0.speaker: Gondian Frell Olsin
0.text: It's too late - they're gonna kill us all. The Overseers, the Motivators - we're all dead.

1.speaker: Gondian Frell Olsin
1.text: Breathe, you're a Gondian - just disarm the collars. But what if I make a mistake? What if set it off? What if - oh god.
1.context: NodeContext: frustrated, scared, talking to self, panicking

2.speaker: Gondian Frell Olsin
2.text: I'm sorry, I'm a good Gondian. I'm sorry!
2.context: NodeContext: full on freak out, panicking, upset (talking to himself, maybe hands in hair and freaking out

4.speaker: Gondian Frell Olsin
4.text: Nothing is wrong, Overseer. I - I have everything under control.
4.context: NodeContext: terrified out of his mind (he's broken something) maybe a low bow, grovelling, scared for his life

6.speaker: Gondian Frell Olsin
6.text: What have I done? They'll kill my wife because of this. You! You made me do this!
6.context: NodeContext: full on freak out, panicking, upset

7.speaker: Gondian Frell Olsin
7.text: The Iron Throne is no more? Gond, let my wife be safe. I'll do anything, just let her be all right.
7.context: NodeContext: trying not to freak out, terrified for his wife

8.speaker: Gondian Frell Olsin
8.text: Thank you for letting me work on the Steel Watch. I am very lucky to be part of this.
8.context: NodeContext: terrified out of his mind, maybe a low bow, grovelling, scared for his life

9.speaker: Gondian Frell Olsin
9.text: I want my house, and my cat, and my wife. I want this all to go away.
9.context: NodeContext: eyes close, thinking of wife, scared
